<s>[INST] Determine whether the following sentence defines a property or non-property type sentence for a design documentation:
The debug system follows the execution-based debug approach described in the RISC-V Debug Specification 0.13.2 and provides the following features.

separate them from concrete instances of components implementing the interfaces.
